devdoc.details: ERC-1155 with native metatransaction methods. These additional functions allow users     to presign function calls and allow third parties to execute these on their behalf.

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: Amount of objects of a given id ID

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

params._owners: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: The _owner's balance of the Token types requested

getIDBinIndex(uint256).details: Return the bin number and index within that bin where ID is
getIDBinIndex(uint256).return: (Bin number, ID"s index within that bin)

getNonce(address).details: Returns the current nonce associated with a given address

params._signer: Address to query signature nonce for

params._binValue: uint256 containing the balances of IDS_PER_UINT256 ids
params._index: index at which to retrieve value

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Function that verifies whether _operator is an authorized operator of _tokenHolder.

params._operator: The address of the operator to query status of

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

isValidSignature(address,bytes,bytes).details: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

params._data: Data structure that was hashed and signed
params._sig: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.
params._signerAddress: Address that should have signed the given hash.

isValidSignature(address,bytes,bytes).return: True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address.

metaSetApprovalForAll(address,address,bo.details: Approve the passed address to spend on behalf of _from if valid signature is provided.

params._data: Encodes signature and gas payment receipt         _data should be encoded as ((bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g))           i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasReimbursed: Whether gas will be reimbursed or not, with vlid signature
params._operator: The address which will act as an operator for _owner.
params._owner: Address that wants to set operator status  _spender.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: transfer objects from different ids to specified address

params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data.         _data should be encoded as (bytes4 METATRANSFER_FLAG, (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g, bytes data))           i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes4, bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array           METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0xebc71fa5 for meta transfer with gas reimbursement           METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0x3fed7708 for meta transfer WITHOUT gas reimbursement (and hence without gasReceipt)
params._from: The address to batchTransfer objects from.
params._ids: Array of ids to update balance of - For this implementation, via `uint256(tokenAddress)`
params._to: The address to batchTransfer objects to.
params._values: Array of amount of object per id to be transferred.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Allow anyone with a valid signature to transfer on the bahalf of _from

params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data.         _data should be encoded as (bytes4 METATRANSFER_FLAG, (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g, bytes data))           i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes4, bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array         METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0xebc71fa5 for meta transfer with gas reimbursement         METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0x3fed7708 for meta transfer WITHOUT gas reimbursement (and hence without gasReceipt)
params._from: The address which you want to send tokens from
params._id: Token id to update balance of - For this implementation, via `uint256(tokenAddress)`.
params._to: The address which you want to transfer to
params._value: The amount of tokens of provided token ID to be transferred

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Will set _operator operator status to true or false

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Query if a contract implements an interface

params._interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

writeValueInBin(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: return the updated _binValue after writing _value at _index

params._binValue: uint256 containing the balances of IDS_PER_UINT256 ids
params._index: Index at which to retrieve value
